articles.content: My First Encounter With cPanel When I first started managing websites, cPanel was everywhere. Shared hosting providers? cPanel. Budget VPS providers? cPanel. Even some premium managed hosting companies used it. At the time, I thought: ‚Äú This must be the industry standard ‚Äî if everyone uses it, it has to be the best. ‚Äù And for a while, it really felt like that. The interface was straightforward, adding domains took seconds, email accounts were a click away, and databases were simple to set up. Bu

These screening systems are designed to stop people from purchasing genetic sequences that could be used to create deadly toxins o
articles.content: A team at Microsoft says it used artificial intelligence to discover a “zero day” vulnerability in the biosecurity systems used to prevent the misuse of DNA. These screening systems are designed to stop people from purchasing genetic sequences that could be used to create deadly toxins or pathogens. To help us potentially answer that question, I'll be hosting a live conversation with prominent AI critic Ed Zitron on October 7 at 3:30 pm ET as part of the Ars Live series. articles.content: Amazon‚Äôs list of 4K-capable streaming sticks got bigger ‚Äî and more confusing ‚Äî after its hardware event this week . You‚Äôre not alone if you find it tough to tell which is best just by going off names, and their prices might lead you astray; the 4K Select costs as much as the 4K Max , while the plain ol‚Äô 4K currently costs $24.99 . articles.content: This is today’s edition of The Download , our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. EV tax credits are dead in the US. Now what? Federal EV tax credits in the US officially came to an end yesterday. Those credits, expanded and extended in the 2022 Inflation Reduction Act, gave drivers up to $7,500 toward the purchase of a new electric vehicle. They‚Äôve been a major force in cutting the up-front costs of EVs, pushing more people to
articles.author: Rhiannon Williams

articles.content: Tesla‚Äôs long-rumored more affordable electric vehicle won‚Äôt be out until next year, but it was recently spotted uncamouflaged on a highway in Texas. And no, your eyes are not fooling you; it‚Äôs just a cheaper version of the Model Y . The rumor that the affordable EV would just be a bare-bones Model Y has been circulating ever since Elon Musk canceled a previous model that was to be built on an entirely new platform. articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins

articles.title: HBO Max subscribers lose access to CNN livestream on November 17
articles.description: WBD is banking on people paying for a dedicated CNN streaming service.
articles.content: HBO Max subscribers will no longer be able to watch CNN from the streaming platform as of November 17, Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) informed customers today. After this date, HBO Max subscribers will still be able to watch some CNN content, including shows and documentaries, on demand. The CNN Max livestream for HBO Max launched as an open beta in September 2023. Since then, it has featured live programming from CNN's US arm and CNN International, as well as content made specifically for HBO Max
articles.author: Scharon Harding
